txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: decrepit finger bones from the Dead in Agamaur. Bring them to Eriac the Strong at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
'These bones will not rise again, though I have no doubt that the Gaunt-lord Ivar has more bones at his disposal.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Take a piece from the bodies of the Dead so that they cannot rise again. A tale, perhaps, but worth a try....'
Eriac the Strong, at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur, desires decrepit finger bones from the Dead found in Agamaur.
Deliver the decrepit finger bones to Eriac the Strong at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur
You accepted a task from Eriac the Strong to acquire decrepit finger bones from the Dead within Agamaur. You can find Eriac the Strong within the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
Wanted: decrepit finger bones from the Dead in Agamaur.
